verses.verse: The hand<WH3027> of Jehovah<WH3068> was upon me<WH3318>, and he brought me out in the Spirit<WH7307> of Jehovah<WH3068>, and set me down<WH5117> in the midst<WH8432> of the valley<WH1237>; and it was full<WH4392> of bones<WH6106>.
And he caused me to pass<WH5674> by them round about<WH5439>: and<WH3966>, behold, there were very many<WH7227> in the open<WH6440> valley<WH1237>; and<WH3966>, lo, they were very dry<WH3002>.
And he said<WH559> unto me<WH1121>, Son of man<WH120>, can these bones<WH6106> live<WH2421>? And I answered<WH559>, O Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>, thou knowest<WH3045>.
Again he said<WH559> unto me<WH5012>, Prophesy over these bones<WH6106>, and say<WH559> unto them<WH3002>, O ye dry bones<WH6106>, hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068>.
Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069> unto these bones<WH6106>: Behold<WH7307>, I will cause breath to enter<WH935> into you<WH2421>, and ye shall live.

And I will lay<WH5414> sinews<WH1517> upon you<WH5927>, and will bring up flesh<WH1320> upon you<WH7159>, and cover you with skin<WH5785>, and put<WH5414> breath<WH7307> in you<WH2421>, and ye shall live; and ye shall know<WH3045> that I am Jehovah<WH3068>.

So I prophesied<WH5012> as I was commanded<WH6680>: and as I prophesied<WH5012>, there was a noise<WH6963>, and<WH7494>, behold, an earthquake; and the bones<WH6106> came together<WH7126>, bone<WH6106> to its bone<WH6106>.
And I beheld<WH7200>, and<WH1517>, lo, there were sinews upon them<WH1320>, and flesh came up<WH5927>, and skin<WH5785> covered<WH7159> them above<WH4605>; but there was no breath in them<WH7307>.

Then said<WH559> he unto me<WH5012>, Prophesy unto the wind<WH7307>, prophesy<WH5012>, son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, and say<WH559> to the wind<WH7307>, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: Come<WH935> from the four<WH702> winds<WH7307>, O breath<WH7307>, and breathe<WH5301> upon these slain<WH2026>, that they may live<WH2421>.

So I prophesied<WH5012> as he commanded<WH6680> me<WH7307>, and the breath came<WH935> into them<WH2421>, and they lived, and stood up<WH5975> upon their feet<WH7272>, an exceeding<WH3966> great<WH1419> army<WH2428>.

Then he said<WH559> unto me<WH1121>, Son of man<WH120>, these bones<WH6106> are the whole house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>: behold<WH559>, they say, Our bones<WH6106> are dried<WH3001> up<WH8615>, and our hope is lost<WH6>; we are clean cut off<WH1504>.

Therefore prophesy<WH5012>, and say<WH559> unto them<WH559>, Thus saith the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: Behold<WH5971>, I will open<WH6605> your graves<WH6913>, and cause you to come up<WH5927> out of your graves<WH6913>, O my people<WH935>; and I will bring you into the land<WH127> of Israel<WH3478>.
And ye shall know<WH3045> that I am Jehovah<WH3068>, when I have opened<WH6605> your graves<WH6913>, and caused you to come up<WH5927> out of your graves<WH6913>, O my people<WH5971>.

And I will put<WH5414> my Spirit<WH7307> in you<WH2421>, and ye shall live, and I will place<WH3240> you in your own land<WH127>: and ye shall know<WH3045> that I<WH3068>, Jehovah, have spoken<WH1696> it and performed<WH6213> it<WH5002>, saith Jehovah<WH3068>.
The word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> came again unto me<WH559>, saying,

And thou<WH1121>, son of man<WH120>, take<WH3947> thee one<WH259> stick<WH6086>, and write<WH3789> upon it<WH3063>, For Judah, and for the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> his companions<WH2270>: then take<WH3947> another<WH259> stick<WH6086>, and write<WH3789> upon it<WH3130>, For Joseph, the stick<WH6086> of Ephraim<WH669>, and for all the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> his companions<WH2270>:
and join<WH7126> them for thee one<WH259> to another<WH259> into one<WH259> stick<WH6086>, that they may become one<WH259> in thy hand<WH3027>.
And when the children<WH1121> of thy people<WH5971> shall speak<WH559> unto thee<WH559>, saying, Wilt thou not show us what thou meanest by these<WH5046>?

say <WH1696> unto them<WH559>, Thus saith the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH136>: Behold<WH3947>, I will take the stick<WH6086> of Joseph<WH3130>, which is in the hand<WH3027> of Ephraim<WH669>, and the tribes<WH7626> of Israel<WH3478> his companions<WH2270>; and I will put<WH5414> them with it<WH6086>, even with the stick of Judah<WH3063>, and make<WH6213> them one<WH259> stick<WH6086>, and they shall be one<WH259> in my hand<WH3027>.
And the sticks<WH6086> whereon thou writest<WH3789> shall be in thy hand<WH3027> before their eyes<WH5869>.

And say<WH1696> unto them<WH559>, Thus saith the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: Behold<WH3947>, I will take the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> from among<WH996> the nations<WH1471>, whither they are gone<WH1980>, and will gather<WH6908> them on every side<WH5439>, and bring<WH935> them into their own land<WH127>:

and I will make<WH6213> them one<WH259> nation<WH1471> in the land<WH776>, upon the mountains<WH2022> of Israel<WH3478>; and one<WH259> king<WH4428> shall be king<WH4428> to them all<WH5750>; and they shall be no more two<WH8147> nations<WH1471>, neither shall they be divided<WH2673> into two<WH8147> kingdoms any more at all<WH4467>;

neither shall they defile<WH2930> themselves any more with their idols<WH1544>, nor with their detestable things<WH8251>, nor with any of their transgressions<WH6588>; but I will save<WH3467> them out of all their dwelling-places<WH4186>, wherein they have sinned<WH2398>, and will cleanse<WH2891> them<WH5971>: so shall they be my people, and I will be their God<WH430>.

And my servant<WH5650> David<WH1732> shall be king<WH4428> over them<WH259>; and they all shall have one shepherd<WH7462>: they shall also walk<WH3212> in mine ordinances<WH4941>, and observe<WH8104> my statutes<WH2708>, and do them<WH6213>.

And they shall dwell<WH3427> in the land<WH776> that I have given<WH5414> unto Jacob<WH3290> my servant<WH5650>, wherein your fathers<WH1> dwelt<WH3427>; and they shall dwell<WH3427> therein<WH1121>, they, and their children, and their children<WH1121>'s children<WH1121>, for ever<WH5769>: and David<WH1732> my servant<WH5650> shall be their prince<WH5387> for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>.

Moreover I will make<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> of peace<WH7965> with them<WH5769>; it shall be an everlasting covenant<WH1285> with them<WH5414>; and I will place them<WH7235>, and multiply them<WH5414>, and will set my sanctuary<WH4720> in the midst<WH8432> of them for evermore<WH5769>.
My tabernacle<WH4908> also shall be with them<WH430>; and I will be their God, and they shall be my people<WH5971>.
And the nations<WH1471> shall know<WH3045> that I am Jehovah<WH3068> that sanctifieth<WH6942> Israel<WH3478>, when my sanctuary<WH4720> shall be in the midst<WH8432> of them for evermore<WH5769>.
